%dirname%disallow-block-expansion.pug:4:5
    2|   tr
    3|     td Cell
  > 4|   tr: td Cell
-----------^
    5| 
    6| table: tr: td Cell
    7| 

Block expansion operators must not be used

    5| 
  > 6| table: tr: td Cell
------------^
    7| 
    8| table: tr: td: span Cell
